mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T.TAG_NAME AS TAG FROM HISTORIES H, FEEDS F, TAGS_IN_FEED T WHERE H.FEED_ID = F.FEED_ID AND F.FEED_ID = T.FEED_ID AND H.USER_ID = #{userId} GROUP BY T.TAG_NAME ORDER BY COUNT(T.TAG_NAME) DESC, T.TAG_NAME ) WHERE ROWNUM <=5

choose.when: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT F.FEED_ID) AS COUNT FROM FEEDS F, LIKE_TABLE L WHERE F.FEED_ID = L.FEED_ID AND (SYSDATE - F.INPUTDATE) <= 31
choose.otherwise: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT FD.FEED_ID) AS COUNT FROM FEEDS FD, TAGS_IN_FEED T, LIKE_TABLE L WHERE FD.FEED_ID = T.FEED_ID AND FD.FEED_ID = L.FEED_ID AND T.TAG_NAME = #{tag} AND (SYSDATE - FD.INPUTDATE) <= 31 AND FD.FEED_ID NOT IN( SELECT FD1.FEED_ID FROM FEEDS FD1 WHERE FD1.USER_ID1 = #{userId} OR FD1.USER_ID2 = #{userId} OR FD1.USER_ID3 = #{userId} OR FD1.USER_ID4 = #{userId} ) AND FD.USER_ID1 NOT IN( SELECT FL1.FOLLOWING_ID FROM FOLLOWINGS FL1 WHERE FL1.USER_ID = #{userId} ) AND FD.USER_ID2 NOT IN( SELECT FL2.FOLLOWING_ID FROM FOLLOWINGS FL2 WHERE FL2.USER_ID = #{userId} ) AND FD.USER_ID3 NOT IN( SELECT FL3.FOLLOWING_ID FROM FOLLOWINGS FL3 WHERE FL3.USER_ID = #{userId} ) AND FD.USER_ID4 NOT IN( SELECT FL4.FOLLOWING_ID FROM FOLLOWINGS FL4 WHERE FL4.USER_ID = #{userId} )

choose.when: SELECT DISTINCT(F.FEED_ID) AS FEED_ID, CONCAT(F.FEED_ID, '--divide--1.png') AS PREVIEW FROM FEEDS F, LIKE_TABLE L WHERE F.FEED_ID = L.FEED_ID AND (SYSDATE - F.INPUTDATE) <= 31 GROUP BY F.FEED_ID ORDER BY COUNT(L.FEED_ID) DESC
choose.otherwise: SELECT DISTINCT(FD.FEED_ID) AS FEED_ID, CONCAT(FD.FEED_ID, '--divide--1.png') AS PREVIEW FROM FEEDS FD, TAGS_IN_FEED T, LIKE_TABLE L WHERE FD.FEED_ID = T.FEED_ID AND FD.FEED_ID = L.FEED_ID AND T.TAG_NAME = #{tag} AND (SYSDATE - FD.INPUTDATE) <= 31 AND FD.FEED_ID NOT IN( SELECT FD1.FEED_ID FROM FEEDS FD1 WHERE FD1.USER_ID1 = #{userId} OR FD1.USER_ID2 = #{userId} OR FD1.USER_ID3 = #{userId} OR FD1.USER_ID4 = #{userId} ) AND FD.USER_ID1 NOT IN( SELECT FL1.FOLLOWING_ID FROM FOLLOWINGS FL1 WHERE FL1.USER_ID = #{userId} ) AND FD.USER_ID2 NOT IN( SELECT FL2.FOLLOWING_ID FROM FOLLOWINGS FL2 WHERE FL2.USER_ID = #{userId} ) AND FD.USER_ID3 NOT IN( SELECT FL3.FOLLOWING_ID FROM FOLLOWINGS FL3 WHERE FL3.USER_ID = #{userId} ) AND FD.USER_ID4 NOT IN( SELECT FL4.FOLLOWING_ID FROM FOLLOWINGS FL4 WHERE FL4.USER_ID = #{userId} ) GROUP BY FD.FEED_ID ORDER BY COUNT(L.LIKE_ID) DESC
